item.title: Monitoring OpenShift cron jobs
item.description: Openshift (and Kubernetes) allow you to run jobs on schedule, but these jobs can fail from time to time. You can monitor them from bash!

item.title: Monitor CyberPower UPS wattage
item.description: Monitor the power consumption of your CyberPower UPS and display the live output in your Linux desktop’s status bar.

item.title: Compare commits between two git branches
item.description: I found myself stuck in a particularly nasty situation a few weeks ago where I had two git branches with some commits that were mixed up.

item.title: Parse kernel.org changelogs with wget and grep
item.description: I try to keep up with the latest kernel update from kernel.
